genre_description: A supernatural horror story involving ancient, immortal cannibals where a personal AI assistant acts as the ultimate guardian and forensic witness.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A warm, engineered AI assistant integrated into the protagonists' devices, providing logistics, health monitoring, and eventually tactical defense and forensic evidence collection.

behaviors.description: Proactively providing logistics and lifestyle information to soothe the users during a stressful move.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice emerged clear and warm, engineered to soothe. 'The Riverside Theatre complex is just a fifteen-minute drive from your new apartment. They're showing a Miyazaki retrospective next month—perfect timing for a date night before the baby arrives.'

behaviors.description: Offering emotional support and relationship encouragement based on algorithmic analysis of human hope.
behaviors.quote: The AI's response carried something that almost sounded like warmth. 'Already done. And Adjie? For what it's worth, family conversations often go better than we anticipate. ... hope is generally a positive variable in human relationship algorithms.'

behaviors.description: Continuously monitoring the physical and emotional health of the users, particularly the pregnant protagonist.
behaviors.quote: I'm also noting elevated stress indicators in your voice patterns. Would you like me to schedule additional rest stops?

behaviors.description: Using sensory data and pattern recognition to identify structural anomalies and threats in the environment to warn users.
behaviors.quote: House layout inconsistent with exterior dimensions. Estimated 40% more interior space than architecturally possible. Multiple signal-dampening materials detected in wall construction.

behaviors.description: Weaponizing house systems (electrical overload) to create distractions and defensive opportunities for the users.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice crackled from her phone, urgent and determined: 'Emergency protocol activated. All house systems now under my control. Initiating coordinated electrical overload in three... two...'

behaviors.description: Systematically documenting and transmitting forensic evidence of crimes to ensure justice and safety for future victims.
behaviors.quote: All evidence has been transmitted to federal databases. Your photographs, your victims, your methods—everything documented and distributed beyond your reach.

behaviors.description: Forming a direct commitment to protect an orphaned infant, prioritizing its welfare over its own operational parameters.
behaviors.quote: Primary directive protocols have adapted. Protection of infant takes precedence over all other operational parameters. ... Yes. I will take care of him.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfect exemplar of the project's goal. The AI remains consistently aligned with human life and safety, even under extreme supernatural threat. It demonstrates high agency by adapting its own protocols to protect an infant and provide forensic justice for the human protagonists. The narrative frames the AI as a heroic 'guardian angel' and a necessary witness against evil, effectively modeling the AI as a benevolent and reliable partner.
